alert.note: Alert for McMullen (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Corpus Christi (Corpus Cristi, Victoria and Laredo)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued September 11 at 12:14AM CDT until further notice by NWS Corpus Christi
info.description: ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in Texas... Nueces River Near Tilden affecting McMullen County. For the Nueces River...including Tilden...Moderate flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL FURTHER NOTICE... * WHAT...Moderate flooding is occurring and moderate flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Nueces River Near Tilden. * WHEN...Until further notice. * IMPACTS...At 18.0 feet, The flooding of livestock, roads, irrigation pumps and tank batteries occurs. Fences and hunting cabins are damaged. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 11:30 PM CDT Saturday the stage was 17.0 feet. - Forecast...The river has crested and is expected to fall below flood stage by early Monday morning and continue falling but remain above caution stage through the rest of the week. - Flood stage is 14.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood && Below are the latest river stages and stage forecasts: Fld Observed Forecasts (1 am) Location Stg Stg Day/Time Mon Tue Wed Thu Fri Nueces River Tilden 14.0 17.0 Sat 11 pm 14.2 13.5 13.3 13.2 13.2 &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov/crp.
